ix.iface.util
Class ChainingMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JMenuItem
                      javax.swing.JMenu
                          ix.iface.util.ChainingMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class ChainingMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenu

A JMenu that can handle a long list of items by "chaining" every so many items to a "More" submenu.

N.B. Only the add(JMenuItem) and addSeparator() methods implement "chaining".

See Also:
Serialized Form
